alert.note: Alert for Hanover; Henrico (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 10 at 5:21PM EST until December 10 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL HANOVER AND NORTHWESTERN HENRICO COUNTIES... At 521 PM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in Short Pump. Between 1.25 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ashland, Randolph Macon College, Tuckahoe, Wyndham, Laurel, Glen Allen, Elmont, Short Pump and Gilman. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
